forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun begins its slow descent, casting a gentle light over Downtown San Francisco, the present atmosphere reflects a quiet coolness rather than the warmth one might seek in midday. A delicate veil of cloud hangs above, hinting at the partial sun that peeks through, making the world appear softened and slightly blurred. The temperature, hovering around a modest 56 degrees, invites layers; a light jacket or sweater would serve well against the north-northeast wind, whispering at about 7 to 8 mph, reminiscent of a soft but persistent voice through the streets.

Looking ahead to tonight, the skies will deepen into a more solid cloud cover, promising a low of about 46 degrees, where the chill of the evening will settle in. Fog dances at the edges of the bay, seeping gradually through the valleys, crafting an ethereal backdrop for the urban tableau as the day shifts to night. It's a fine evening to wander through the neighborhoods, perhaps enjoying a quiet café along a bustling street, or exploring one of the local art galleries that stay open late. Amidst all the movement of the day, there's an almost meditative quality to the city, inviting you to slow down and embrace the gentle hum of life around you.
